title: Sports style squared off slab-serif
content:
Hi everyone, I'm looking for something similar to this... doesn't have to be an exact match. Would prefer if it had multiple weights though. Any thoughts?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [slab-serif.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017160154/http:/typophile.com/files/slab-serif_0.jpg) | 114.84 KB |
author: ljohnson

comments.content: Preferably yes. Pickyness sucks sometimes haha :), but like I said it doesn't have to be identical, I'm just having difficulty finding something sports typewriter-esq with the squared slab look.

This is United Serif from House Industries:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017160154/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts")

Why yes, yes it is.  
Thank you very much.
